entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as the opposing team in the game.

entities.name: urquhart
entities.description: Urquhart is a Slytherin player who attempts to score a goal.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley refers to Ron Weasley, a Gryffindor player who makes spectacular saves.

entities.name: smith
entities.description: Smith is mentioned as the commentator who says that Weasley gets lucky sometimes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a Gryffindor player who is searching for the Snitch.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as Harry's team that is leading in the game.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a Gryffindor player who scores four goals.

entities.name: zacharias
entities.description: Zacharias is a Slytherin player who wonders if the Weasleys are only there because Harry likes them.

entities.name: peakes
entities.description: Peakes is a Slytherin player who is being questioned by Zacharias.

entities.name: coote
entities.description: Coote is a Slytherin Beater who is hit with a Bludger by Harry.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: Bludger is an object that is used in the game.

relationships.description: Harry hits Coote with a Bludger.
Harry is searching for the Snitch.
